attributes.action: change the findings of a court  if administration of a court deliberately destroyed evidence and not had findings made by a qualified person
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There should be a way forward if a person has been caused civil liberties abuse by a biased and unqualified legally  Governmental administration. One of these found in own favour overriding an Appeals  Tribunal Decision findings ignoring evidence the Appeal before  that resulted in cardiac arrest.  Surely professional and legal negligence?!!

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
